concept.title: Oil Specifications for the Model T Motor
concept.shortdesc: The motor requires medium light high-grade gas engine oil for optimal performance and engine protection.

section.title: Recommended Oil Properties
section.p: Medium light oil is the optimal choice for the motor because it:

ul.li: Reaches bearings more easily than heavy oils
Maintains sufficient body to protect bearing surfaces

section.title: Oil Considerations
section.p: Heavy and inferior oils should be avoided as they can:

section.title: Special Requirements
section.p: Light grade oil with a low cold test is essential for winter operation.

section.title: Important Caution
section.p: Graphite must not be used as a lubricant in the engine or transmission as it may short-circuit the magneto.
